note: Requires the ability to trade in order to work properly.
description: Compels an entity to look at the player that is currently trading with the entity.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Look At Trading Player Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to look at the player they are trading with.

fields.title: Angle Of View Horizontal
fields.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see in the Y-axis (up-down).

fields.title: Angle Of View Vertical
fields.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see in the X-axis (left-right).

fields.title: Look Distance
fields.description: The distance in blocks from which the entity will look at the player this mob is trading with.

fields.title: Look Time
fields.description: Time range to look at the player this mob is trading with.

fields.title: Probability
fields.description: The probability of looking at the target. A value of 1.00 is 100%.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
